description:
While Haru and Ren are out at a nearby zoo, Aki calls Haru to let him know a woman calling herself "Kiyoka" has showed up at the house. Kiyoka is Haru`s high school classmate and the co-owner of the cafe they`re about to open. While discussing the plans and preparations for the store, Kiyoka mentions a certain woman to Haru and gives him her contact information. Meanwhile, when Kiyoka asks Ren what he likes about Haru...
Source: crunchyroll
